reviews.comments: Comfortable, good location
The apartment is just according to the pictures and we had an amazing stay!
Spacious Place, clean, bright, smooth check in and out. Easy to communicate and very welcoming!! The place has nice views and near the dubai mall. We had a great stay!
Smooth check in process and very clean room
Fast response. Apartment was clean, free valet parking was available for all of our cars. Smooth and great overall experience

Apart is really big and very well designed. It’s suitable for a big company and you can easily spend time without bothering each other. Three separate rooms plus big kitchen and living room are making your stay very comfortable.
Location is wonderful. Just a 15 min walk from Burj Khalif.
Valet parking also a nice free option

Al Ashrafia, the host was very easy to contact. I choose the this Appartment but I got different one because the Appartment need maintenance. There was Nabil available to meet us at check in. He help us to be comfortable with new apartment by giving us an upgrade Appartment which is big, clean , perfect view and great location. We really loved this appartment.
Would definitely stay again and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a unique apartment experience in Dubai
Great apartment, very clean and good location. Communication and check in was seamless. Would definitely stay again next time I’m in Dubai. Highly recommend

Lovely apartment.  Spacious clean and fabulous views. Great comfortable beds. Soaps and shampoos provided. Nespresso pods a great touch. Convenient location. Short 10 min walk to fountain. Handy pizza and other restaurants underneath building on the boardwalk. Great pool which supplies beach towels. Up to date gym. Would recommend when staying in Dubai.

The place is in a great location. 10 mins walk to Dubai mall. Great views of the canal. Overall the place was very clean and the rooms spacious with plenty closet space. Great place for a family to stay. The only setback was the wifi was not great. It worked on and off. Overall I would recommend this place. Host was also very fast with responding. Building amenities were great with free valet parking.

My stay at Penthouse Five Palm was truly exceptional. The elegant design and impeccable furnishings provided unparalleled luxury and comfort. Attention to detail was evident, from high-quality linens to state-of-the-art appliances.
Raj and his dedicated team's outstanding hospitality made my experience unforgettable. They went above and beyond to accommodate my needs and shared valuable local insights. Raj's attentive and thoughtful approach to guest relations made me feel like a valued friend.
The prime location offers easy access to attractions, shops, and restaurants. I highly recommend Penthouse Five Palm for a luxurious and unforgettable getaway, with the perfect blend of stunning accommodations and exceptional hospitality provided by Raj and his team.

The staff looking after us in the villa were excellent, they met every single one of our needs. Bert is an amazing host and I really recommend this stay!

Luxury Concierge is focused on very new and well located high standard holiday rentals all over the globe, we manage more than 50 Properties. we pride ourselves on providing exceptional service to our guests. our goal is for guests to create great memories you can take home. we believe a great rental should be authentic taking you back to genuine customer service, high end properties, we hope that even the most well-traveled will WOW over all the little luxuries that await you in our properties.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay and the size of the villa and location were fabulous. There were a few technical issues that our host did her best to solve but the villa is in need of maintenance in a few areas. The pool tiles are in need of repair. The air conditioning was leaking over the floor in one bathroom and we had some drainage and electrical issues. All that said we had a great time and it is brilliant for children.
reviews.response: Hi Susan, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! And especially  for your understanding on these matters, sometimes maintenance issues appear which we always do our upmost to ensure these are solved ASAP. The pool tiles are scheduled for fixing as for this we need to empty the pool. It was a pleasure to host you. We are really glad you enjoyed your  overall stay with us. We would like to thank you again for choosing LUX Holiday Home and we look forward to welcoming you again soon. Regards, Sharon, Operations Director.

reviews.comments: The villa itself and the hosts are amazing, one of the nicest AirBnBs I've ever seen/stayed at. Everything was on point, cleanliness, support when needed, amenities etc. The only reason for the 4 star rating is the security at the compound's gate, it is a nightmare to try and get additional guests to visit if they haven't previously submitted a copy of their passports (a day in advance) which isn't always practical.

Located right off the beach, my tweens enjoyed the infinity pool, my young adults loved being able to walk right out the villa into the “happening spot” at the bar with music and bigger pool, and my husband and I enjoyed the jacuzzi on the rooftop over looking the city lights! Chammy is the on-site coordinator and addressed all questions, while Bert was attentive and accommodated all of our needs before, during , and after check-in. I highly recommend this villa.
What a great villa! 5 stars all the way around for Bert and his team. The accommodations and service were incredible!

reviews.comments: The villa is very nice and the view is stunning, I was looking forward to coming back soon but unfortunately, me and my family all left the villa sick including my 2 months old baby. We kept sneezing all night and when I looked closely, I saw the dust everywhere, found clumps of dust on the headboard. Looks like they mopped the floors, cleaned the tables and that’s it, everything else was very dusty.
reviews.response: HI Remma, Thank you for your feedback. We apologize you felt this way, but glad you liked the villa. We don't normally get this feedback,  We offered to send housekeeping when you reported it a few days into your stay to resolve this, but you advised you did,nt want anyone in the villa. Unfortunately living in the dessert in dubai and on the beach, everywhere needs redusting every 2/3 days. We will ensure we work hard to ensure our dusting standards are improved and thank you for your understanding. We would like to thank you again for choosing LUX Holiday Home and we hope to host you again in the future. Regards, Sharon, Operations Director.

reviews.comments:
The location is absolutely stunning, can’t beat it. House is under renovation some rooms and bathrooms are new and complete, some are still be worked on. Renovated rooms are nice and look like the photos.
When we moved in, the house was definitely not cleaned properly, being a farely large house there was lot of dust all over (shelves etc. ) on top of this there were trash from previous tenants in the living room, the head board of beds had hair from previous tenants all over. The cleaning supplies and equipment they had were missing, old and dirty. When we complained about this to the hosts they were very accomodating. They arranged for another cleaning session and when we asked for a vacuum cleaner so we could clean ourselves they gave us a brand new one. Thank you!
Despite our dissapointment regarding cleaning we still loved the location, the house and our time spent there was priceless. We would come back.

reviews.response:
Dear Abulrhman, we extend our sincere appreciation for bringing this matter to our attention. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this situation may have caused you during your stay with us. We wish to inform you that the unpleasant smell experienced during your stay was a result of an issue related to the building's maintenance.
We are pleased to inform you that the matter has been promptly resolved by the builder responsible for the maintenance of the building. We assure you that your feedback has been invaluable in helping us maintain the high standards of quality and comfort that we are committed to providing to our valued guests.
We look forward to welcoming you and your family to our apartment again soon. Kindly let us know if we can assist you with anything at all. Our team is available for you 24X7.

reviews.comments:
Punit & team were simply wonderful hosts. We appreciate the pro-active communication and the readiness to lend an assistance to make our stay perfect.
The property itself is tastefully decorated and amenities were generously provided for our family of 7. Location was convenient (linked to Dubai Mall) with plenty of options of restaurants and cafes. Waitrose Supermarket is just a 3min walk below the condo.

Great apartment , great location, check in was easy , communication seamless.

Big thanks to the hosts Deepika, Jas and Gaurav who were very attentive and made sure all requests and any issues were taken care of right away.  Great view from the terrace and lovely location.  I definitely would recommend staying here if you are looking to stay in the downtown area!

This is a stunning 3 en-suite apartment with a maid’s room. My family of 4 plus my helper enjoyed the apartment very much. It has everything we need. The communication is very responsive. The location is great. Thank you Jas and Deepika.

reviews.comments: From booking to leaving there was nothing that was too much for Alessandro or Hla, the place is amazing and suited our family of 14 perfectly. Kids loved the pool and it’s literally on the beach, so many nice places to eat and even managed a night out for the adults at Bla Bla. Location is perfect for getting to everything within around 30/40 minutes depending on traffic. Would definitely book again either for a big group or try one of the smaller properties for a small family holiday.

Alessandro is an incredible host. Not only is his home beautiful, but he was so helpful coordinating for. our large group.  I had to plan a trip for 20 people and we booked 2 airbnbs through Alessandro. As you can imagine, planning a trip for that many people is no easy task. Alessandro's made the process seamless and we had more than enough space at both homes. I cannot say enough good things about this property and the other. The pool was pristine and so needed in the hot 106+ degree weather. Don't hesitate and book one of Alessandro's properties.

primaryHost.about:
Vivo tra Roma (35%) e Dubai (65%) sono Italiano e prima di essere un coo-locatore per conto di landlord locali sono un turista in quanto tutta la mia vita è un viaggio, ho visitato tutto il mondo dalle foreste amazzoniche e del Borneo ad Australia fino ai ghiacciai del polo Artico …
Dal 2004 ho interessi in U.A.E. seguendo il mercato turistico da prima a dopo il crak del 2009.
Sono attualmente Residente a Dubai - nella zona più bella: (Dubai Marina) 

Dal 2010 aiuto i proprietari nella gestione di 8 appartamenti, ville e Penthouses nella zona più  bella di Dubai, tutti gli appartamenti sono particolari in quanto hanno esclusività di pregio, esempio la Penthouse in JBR è l’unnico appartamento di Dubai Marina Beach Walk con una vista unica nel cuore della strada più trend di Dubai. Nel 2012 una Tv australiana ha affittato l’attico per mandare in diretta il capodanno con vista mozzafiato. 
Ho una mia collaboratrice/amica che parla 6 lingue che incontra gli ospiti all’arrivo, i nostri ospiti lasciano tutti (il 90%) una recensione e  sono tutte (100%)  bellissime, significa che sono contenti.
Diamo la possibilità di passare una vacanza unica, diamo supporto in tutto, informazioni turistiche, trucchi per pagare meno i servizi, sconti nei ristoranti, posti  trend e assistenza turistica a 360° per chi ne ha bisogno
Insomma il nostro più che un lavoro è ricevere amici in un posto bellissimo e dargli modo di fare una vacanza indimenticabile
Alessandro

reviews.comments: Alessandro's penthouse is absolutely amazing. In the heart of JBR we could walk to the beach, restaurants, shopping, and supermarket within minutes. The penthouse was huge for our party of 9 and we utilized the private pool daily. Ms Hla provided cooking and turn down bedding daily which allowed us even more time to explore Dubai and made the trip even more impressive. I've stayed in accommodations all over the world and this was a top 3 experience for me. I would give this host and penthouse 100 stars for a family-friendly amazing trip to Dubai. Thank you, Alex and Hla for making our trip so memorable and exceptional.

Great location and a clean apartment.

Overall the decor / finishes are a bit tired and could do with being updated eg many pool tiles missing, cracked covers, dying plants, etc Having said that, it is good if you’re coming with a ‘wild’ family as you feel relaxed and not worried about causing damage to a pristine place.
Perfect location for the beach and restaurants and amazing views from the terrace.

This place was absolutely incredible!! From the check in process through the entire trip, we felt like VIP! The views are stunning! The rooms are massive! Highly recommend having Mrs. Hla cook while there! We can not wait to return to dubai and be on top of the world! Don't miss out on this spectacular experience of staying there!

Vivo tra Roma (35%) e Dubai (65%) sono Italiano e prima di essere un coo-locatore per conto di landlord locali sono un turista in quanto tutta la mia vita è un viaggio, ho visitato tutto il mondo dalle foreste amazzoniche e del Borneo ad Australia fino ai ghiacciai del polo Artico …

Dal 2010 aiuto i proprietari nella gestione di 8 appartamenti, ville e Penthouses nella zona più  bella di Dubai, tutti gli appartamenti sono particolari in quanto hanno esclusività di pregio, esempio la Penthouse in JBR è l’unnico appartamento di Dubai Marina Beach Walk con una vista unica nel cuore della strada più trend di Dubai. reviews.comments: Linson who works for Dream Inn was very responsive but the villa itself needs attention. The photos advertising it are no longer up to date - money needs to be spent on the whole villa but in particular on the bathrooms and swimming pool. Hot running water is needed in all showers rather than tepid and the sinks have scolding hot water which is dangerous. In one shower a bath tap had been added to replace the shower control - you had to kneel on the floor to have a shower under the running tap. The grids around the pool have gone and been replaced with tile slabs. We couldn’t use the pool as my husband cut himself on one of the slabs - they were slippy and broke easily. The garage doors were broken and permanently left opened which caused concern for our hire car. Basics were also missing like a dustpan and brush (it took 4 days of asking to finally get one from Dream Inn). We’ve stayed on the Palm several times and this villa is not up to standard currently (with TLC it could be).
reviews.response: Dear Suzanne, thank you for choosing to stay at Dream inn Holiday Homes and for your review. We deeply regret your experience at our apartment and assure you we will discuss your review at our management meeting and share it with the teams for improvement. We look at your concerns as an opportunity to improve our service, and as such take them very seriously. What you experienced is a one-off incident and not a reflection of our usual standards. We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you and to provide you a better experience during your next stay. Yours sincerely, Dream Inn Holiday Homes

reviews.comments: Staff its ok but the villa very old and bad broken everywhere old AC not working good only 26 and 25 if some one vest you should give i d copy 3 hours be for or security will not allowed in very completed and allowing all another owner but because this villa holiday home completed everything

I would  advise anyone NOT to trust this company. I booked a stay on the Palm for 8 people six months ago and Dream Inn’s cancelled my original reservation as they advised there were issues in Villa and upgraded to another. Which we accepted. However on the day of check in I was in constant conversations to see if we could get in earlier.  At no point did they state there was a problem with the Villa and just two hours before checkin Dream Inns phoned and cancelled my reservation due to “issues” at the Villa and only offered two 2 bedroom apartments on the Marina.  The whole point of booking a villa on the Palm was to stay on the Palm together as a family and NOT in two separate apartments on the Marina.  Air BNB were able to find us something else luckily but I would not recommend booking any properties via Dream Inns

Don't be misled by the photos! This is a well-located property, but needs some serious attention to the basics. We had to deal with broken showers, no plugs in baths, broken TV, broken and rotting cupboards in the kitchen, problems with bathroom hot water, no bins in the rooms, many lights not working, outside sun-beds full of holes and covered in bird excrement. The hosts did come every time we needed them, but in the end we got fed up and moved out to a hotel, as we didn't want to spend our holiday organising work on someone else's property!

The pool photos show Burj in the background, these should be removed as buildings have been built to block the view. Check in was very easy and communication with Kirt was excellent.

reviews.comments: This place exceeded our ex expectations.  It was very spacious for the 8 of us. The supermarket was right downstairs adjacent to the building. The host was quick to respond to the one problem we had. The only annoying part of the stay was the renovations in the apartment right above us which started like 6am. We went out and did different activities everyday so the noise from the renovations upstairs were done when we returned every evening.The host can no control over that but I wish I had known prior to booking.  Would I book again with this host at the same apartment? ABSOLUTELY!  I give this place a 4.9 out of 5 only  because the power went out a couple of times but not for long. Anyone who books this unit will not regret it. It made our stay memorable.

In regards to the maintenance work, I wish we could do something about it, however the building management doesn't notify other residents in case of any maintenance works in any apartments nearby. Should we become aware of such, we will notify as soon as possible.

reviews.comments:
Loved the house! We had such an amazing vacation. Been vacationing in Dubai for 10 years but this was our first vacation in a house. The privacy and safety at the location is amazing. You just step outside and can swim and enjoy a long beautiful beach walk. Children played for hours at the beach and swam in the warm water. Pool was clean and garden beautiful but as the salty water in the sea was more appealing we didn’t even use the pool.
The house has a very good price value ratio. The house is perfectly clean and beautiful. The beds are very nice and sheets perfectly soft.
Sun is in the garden in the evening, so it is perfectly situated.
The only thing we didn’t love was that the AC system that could not be regulated in all the bedrooms seperately. One control was controlling 2 bedrooms at once and one room has quite a noisy AC. But the house was nice an cool inside so we just switched it off for the night and had really no issues with it.
We would absolutely stay again!

reviews.comments: This is a smart and well located villa, the hosts were generally helpful and responsive but there were some issues. The front downstairs sitting room, now used as a bedroom has no curtains on the glass double doors to the main entrance hall. The downstairs “Maids room” was dingy and gloomy, with little natural light The glass door to a minute yard was cracked and taped. The room is not the one shown in photo on website and was not pleasant. The kitchen table and chairs were covered in unsightly plastic. The garden loungers were not as photographed and there was no umbrella as shown in the  photographs. I questioned this at check in but was told it was the landlord’s responsibility. Shade is important to be able to enjoy the outside space in Dubai. There were only 7 dinner plates and 5 matching glass tumblers. We were eventually given another 4 of each very minimalist for a luxury villa! However a plumbing issue with a blocked toilet and shower was promptly resolved. But a great holiday

This house is amazing! The location and view is just wonderful. The beach is so quite and pool was perfect for us. We loved our stay here and will remember it for a long time. Honestly the view (especially at night) is just amazing and overall house is gorgeous.
A couple of little niggles, their is a construction site next door which we weren’t aware of and did get noisy at times. The kitchen wasn’t that well equipped for such a big house I’d say, a few more of everything would be great plus little extras like a tea towel and dish cloth would be a nice addition. Finally one night at 3am a neighbour came into our villa by mistake, an honest accident although frightening at the time. One side door can be opened when locked, we advised of this but no one came to look or fix. The pool could do with a little maintenance too which again we advised of and someone came but nothing changed. Finally one last annoyance was the security, whilst this did make us feel safe… we submitted passport copies of our visitors a good 6 hours in advance but it took almost an hour to get through as they’d not received them for some reason.

Dear Martin, thank you very much for your review, reviews are a special means that allows guests to have double feedback on where they are going to stay, a holiday is a precious asset and it is right that you must have the best possible. I really appreciate customers who spend time after their stay, this denotes gratitude and altruism as you do something for others I am happy with your review also because it is very nice, having full marks is wonderful and gives us the strength to be more and more attentive to customer needs, we know that not everything is always perfect and that we must always improve but be gratified as the we are (we are breaking all positive feedback records) this makes us proud and gives us more and more desire to host wonderful guests like you and your group I hope to have you as a guest again soon, usually many guests come back, write to me next time, it will be a pleasure to give you a nice discount on your next booking Cordial greetings
Alessandro Londero
Dubaiselfcatering

reviews.comments: Amazing Surrounding , Clean Apartment,  Ample of Space , Comfortable Beds, Good Showers, The air conditioning can be better , the entire apartment doesn’t go lower than 22 degrees Celsius overall . Gets quite warm .
Very responsive host

I will start by saying the apartment is aesthetically beautiful. IT is a great space directly facing the Burj.
Unfortunately, the minute you walk in something is up. We were told to give a credit card for a security deposit (not ok), then the guy who checked us in (after keeping us waiting for 15 min knowing we were on our way) left and we are In an apartment not knowing how to use anything. NO INSTRUCTIONS for hot water, washer, dryer, ac, NOTHING and nothing works well. It really added frustration to be in a beautiful space, but not be able to shower and not be able to do a load of laundry because nothing will dry properly.
Mohammed was not the person renting this!! We were told by the building that the company renting it is doing so illegally. Went to the infinity pool and we were told it is for guests only and we had to leave.
Although I loved the space, it is really being run in a way that can break a vacation. There are too many other options than to risk this again

Excellent stay in this property..
The views are surreal.. huge rooms & living room..
Right in the centre of all the attractions in dubai.. if your are visiting dubai this is the place you should be staying .. Osama is a great guy.. his hospitality is way beyond anyone could imagine..
Overall a perfect stay.. would definitely be coming back to this property again.. thank you Osama& Westminster 😊

The host requested a security deposit from me when I arrived at the Airbnb. I now know that this is not a part of Airbnb's policy. The host said it was a security deposit for damages. $816.99 was posted to my account once I checked out and there were no damages. The host claimed that the cleaning crew had to clean for 4 hours. That does not amount to $816.99 and the Airbnb price already includes a cleaning fee. They claimed they would return my money to me via Western Union and I still have not received it. During our stay, the host also had a showing of the apartment. He used the master key to show the apartment to potential buyers while we were still in there. VERY UNPROFESSIONAL!!!

Positives:
Very nice and luxurious apartment. Great location with direct access to Dubai Mall.
Check in was quick and smooth.
Great view from the balcony and windows to Burj Khalifa.
Full kitchen and free water bottles.
You can use the hotel’s room service 24/7
Negatives:
I waited 10 minutes in the lobby until Osama showed up for check in.
There was blood spot on one of the bed sheets. I informed Osama but no response.
No daily housekeeping and when they came they don’t change the bed sheets and towels.
I would recommend this place for a luxury stay in Dubai and wish if they take the negative comments in consideration since the amount of money is very sufficient to fix these little issues.
Nice apartment located perfectly

This place I would say worth every penny you would pay for. Spacious, well located, and comfortable. However, I don’t mind trying this place again and recommend it to other people as well since I understand that it’s extremely busy time in the area.

highly recommend this place for anyone visiting dubai for holiday or work

primaryHost.about:
Vivo tra Roma (35%) e Dubai (65%) sono Italiano e prima di essere un coo-locatore per conto di landlord locali sono un turista in quanto tutta la mia vita è un viaggio, ho visitato tutto il mondo dalle foreste amazzoniche e del Borneo ad Australia fino ai ghiacciai del polo Artico …
Dal 2004 ho interessi in U.A.E. seguendo il mercato turistico da prima a dopo il crak del 2009.
Sono attualmente Residente a Dubai - nella zona più bella: (Dubai Marina) 

Dal 2010 aiuto i proprietari nella gestione di 8 appartamenti, ville e Penthouses nella zona più  bella di Dubai, tutti gli appartamenti sono particolari in quanto hanno esclusività di pregio, esempio la Penthouse in JBR è l’unnico appartamento di Dubai Marina Beach Walk con una vista unica nel cuore della strada più trend di Dubai. Nel 2012 una Tv australiana ha affittato l’attico per mandare in diretta il capodanno con vista mozzafiato. 
Ho una mia collaboratrice/amica che parla 6 lingue che incontra gli ospiti all’arrivo, i nostri ospiti lasciano tutti (il 90%) una recensione e  sono tutte (100%)  bellissime, significa che sono contenti.
Diamo la possibilità di passare una vacanza unica, diamo supporto in tutto, informazioni turistiche, trucchi per pagare meno i servizi, sconti nei ristoranti, posti  trend e assistenza turistica a 360° per chi ne ha bisogno
Insomma il nostro più che un lavoro è ricevere amici in un posto bellissimo e dargli modo di fare una vacanza indimenticabile
Alessandro

reviews.comments: Wonderful place to stay! Just keep in mid that then guest room is really really tiny. The rest of the apartment is really wonderful, the views are amazing, can't ask for more. Definitely will stay again and recommend it.
Stinky toilets
reviews.response: Hi Shane, thank you for your feedback. We do our best to make every stay enjoyable, and we apologize for falling short here. We'll work to improve for the future. We hope to host you again and show you a better experience.

reviews.comments: Wonderful views, great location, helpful staff. Would recommend.
Friendly Staff, Awesome location. I highly recommend
Fantastic place to stay! I will definitely be checking Sonder next time I head back to Dubai.
Awesome place

Amazing! From check in to check out! I found my place that I will forever stay in! Love the views. Nobody had to worry about views because all rooms had super nice views. All beds were big and all rooms were a great size. Floor to ceiling windows were immaculate. Super clean and friendly staff. The gym, sauna and steam room were great. Beach front property with pool. All you can ask for!
Excellent place and service. Location - right next to the beach, pool, walk … would come again.

Second time staying
Great place , great location and great staff
Good

primaryHost.about: 9000+ spaces. 40+ cities. We exist to make better spaces open to all. Every Sonder is thoughtfully designed as an all-in-one space for working, playing, or living.

name: Luxury  Modern White Villa on Island | 9,500 sqft

reviews.comments: We were welcomed by the host of the villa and was very friendly and responsive. The villa was big and looks nice but there was a lot of construction around the villa area and and there was a smell as well coming from it. But above it all, as we were hardly in the villa, it was a nice and clean place for 8 people to rest comfortably after a day out.

1. The internet kept disconnecting throughout the stay and we were not able to connect to the network from our rooms.
2. We found an empty beer bottle.
3. There were a lot of ants in the villa, due to the opening from the garage door and a lot of insects can get in through the slit.
4. The location was really noisy, so many construction workers that cause a ruckus. It was 24/7 throughout our whole stay.
5. The living room upstairs which has a TV, doesn’t work nor does it turn on.
6. The Master bedroom TV doesn't turn on too as well as we found blonde hairs on the bed.
7. The main living room downstairs TV kept glitching and disconnecting from the wifi which was very frustrating.

The pool wasn't clean and a man was there to clean outside plus around the pool only. This cleaning should be done before we reach as kids need to enjoy. They were some dirts and hair inside one of the bathroom as well towels can’t be used. We noticed a very bad smell in the room on first level until we used perfumes.
On the other hand, the place was big and enough to accommodate families with kids. The noise was like someone who was nocking on the door while sleeping. We received the keys on 3:30 and checkout was too early at 11:00. I can rate this place 3/5
Best place to be with your families. Hopefully when they finish the construction leading to the villa, it will be super fun. I will be back again.
It was a wonderful experience!  I strongly recommend this villa 👏🏻
The host wasn’t helpful at all, because we found the street blocked and there was an construction for the road. Also, we can’t sleep very well because the area was noisy.

Villa is spacious and light. It’s located in a very safe area. But on downside the nightclub music sounds on one side and the port noise on the other side of villa made our stay uncomfortable during nightime. The cleanliness could be better especially in the kitchen and showers. The furniture is ok, but with worn out signs here and there. Otherwise the stay was wornderful, the host was very responsive and welcoming.
Good place and well located
Great villa. Highly recommend
Could be a lot more better then what we paid for it! The villa manager wasn’t really helpful. She didn’t put my mind at ease. House keeping should have been included in the price we paid.

name: Zabeel Saray Royal Residences Lagoon Villa

reviews.comments: Good property with great service and they even gave us a late checkout for free.

My family and I had a wonderful experience at the villa. It was spacious, beautiful, and easy access to pool and beach. My kids went crazy with the DJ equipment which made for a great entrance. The coffee maker is actually a nice change from standard coffee makes that you place a pod in. This coffee maker grounds the coffee real time.
All in all it was a very pleasant staycation in Dubai breaking away for a long weekend. Note this side of the palm is much less traffic compared to the other side of Atlantis. A positive to get in and out of you need to.

I wish I could give you seven stars! This villa is breathtaking! Pictures aren’t enough justice. We had five couples staying in the villa, and everyone was comfortable. All of the rooms except the 6th bedroom (which is the butler’s suite) resemble one another. There are many amenities, and it’s located in a great spot on the palm. The restaurants inside of the hotel that were within walking distance from the villa were perfect. They always comfortably accommodated my group of 10 adults. The host was amiable and responsive. I would come back again!!!

We just spent 3 weeks at this beautiful villa and I have to say it exceeded all our expectations. I don’t think pictures do the justice to this place. I looked through a lot of villas and they all looked amazing but after reading horrible reviews I almost changed my mind about renting a villa( big family vacation and a germaphobe sister) and luckily found this place!
Rooms are much nicer, bathrooms are bigger than on pictures and the living is huge! And I think it’s worth mentioning that you even have access to the pool straight from the living room. There’s also downstairs and upstairs terrace.Everything was spotless and cleaning is available at your request.
The managing team was amazing, responded to messages within minutes and so polite and professional.
Guests also get free access to Zabeel Saray Hotel (less than 1 min walk) gym, all pools, kids club, room service, spa facilities etc.
First time renting a villa and it was one of the best holidays we ever had!
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Incredible Villa, all of the rooms were great, looks exactly as it does in the photos. The hosts were extremely responsive, replying to any texts very quickly, he was happy to meet us and let us in. Would highly recommend!
Bert and Chami were, once again, wonderful hosts.  Highly recommended!  Exclusive Holiday Homes is one of the most professionally run Airbnb's.  I would definitely stay with them again!

Words enough can't express the best experience I ever had with our stay.  My family and I travel from SC, USA and had a great experience with this house. It was prefect. The best house ever.  It was exactly as pictured. Everyone with Exclusive Holiday was responsive from the start.  Bert was helpful from the start of my booking. We were greeted at the villa by our host Chammy.  He was awesome.  Our flight was delayed leaving from Miami, Florida and he didn't seem to mind us checking in later than expected.  He greeted us, provided us with drinks and helped carried our luggage to our rooms.  During our stay, he periodically checked upon us and even helped me purchased milk at a local store.  He was so helpful with restaurant recommendations and even transportation information.  It can be hard traveling to a foreign country not knowing where to get basic necessities, but Chammy made it so much easier.  No matter the time of day if I had a question, he was prompt to respond back to me.

Absolutely fantastic property and location. The restaurants within the hotel were amazing.
Only slight complaint I would have is that the pool is only open from 9am - 6pm. This isn't the hosts fault, as it was a resort rule, but it does impact your enjoyment somewhat.
reviews.response: Hi Lee. Many thanks for being a wonderful guest and leaving such a nice review. I’d just like to mention that it absolutely is possible to use the lagoon pool at night, however there is no lifeguard on duty therefore swimmers use the pool at their own risk. The pool has no open / closing times, just the lifeguard is present during the day only. Best wishes, Management

reviews.comments:
Amazing service, spotless location and a very responsive guest service.
Always available to assist in any matter.
Highly recommend the villa…

We had a brilliant time at the Villa. The photos do not do the lagoon justice it is a beautiful place to stay and pool is perfect.
Our large group which ranged from age 4 months to 65 enjoyed every moment. The villa was clean, spacious and had lots of little extra touches that made it feel special such as the DJ system and complimentary goodies on arrival.
The service was impeccable from both the staff at Zabeel Saray and of course Chami who was very accommodating and made sure we were well take care of.
Huge thanks to Bert who answered all our questions before and during the trip to make sure this was extra special for the family.
A trip that we will never forget!

primaryHost.about: Hi, we are Exclusive Holiday Homes, a licensed short term rental operator based in Dubai. As our name suggests, our properties are exclusive, and truly best in class. We maintain our properties with no expense spared, and look after our guests with their every request. The result is the happiest customers who stay with us time and time again. We provide ongoing support and butler service throughout your stay, effectively filling the gap between luxury hotels and holiday homes.

name: Private Pool Apt. Five Palm Jumeirah up to 6guest

reviews.comments: Amazing host with a wonderful unit. Super fun environment.
5 stars in every single thing , just fabulous

Andrea’s place was just as described it was beautiful very clean and in perfect location she was very attentive & responsive not to mention she let us check in early because of a early arrival…Will stay here whenever we visit Dubai. Thanks Andrea!
I would like to express my appreciation to Andrea for everything she did to make the trip as perfect as possible, it will not be my last booking for sure. Looking for the coming trips Andrea.

Resident block in 5 with ground floor pool, outside dinning and direct access  (2m walk) to the beach . To noisey if outside by the pool, 5s pool party daily blaring out music till 10pm- there should be a warning about that but the rooms are great, sound proofed and well specked. Lots of thoughtful touches - scribes, provisions etc. fantastic host . Good stay ,
It was amazing vacationat the villa with the pool was amazing. I will come back again soon
We stayed for a week . Better than expected. Andrea was very responsive.

I cannot say enough about Andrea’s home. It was really the perfect getaway for our family of five. We have three young kids below the age of six and we had such a great experience. Yes the resort is more of an adult’s playground with pool parties, high end everything, and nice restaurants, but honestly the kids pool, kids club, beach access, and Andrea’s private pool were so accommodating for our young kids. Really enjoyed it! Would absolutely repeat!

Andrea’s apartment is fantastic! Wonderfully private and quiet yet set within a lively 5* hotel resort with all the facilities at your disposal.
We travelled with two teenagers and had the best time! The private pool is a huge bonus and has pleasant shade in the morning and sun in the afternoon and is beautifully clean.
Access to the beach is a 2 minute walk through the back gate and sunbeds easy to find in the mornings. We swam in the sea every day and the views of Dubai from there are fantastic! If you have young kids the children’s pool is also just beyond the back gate too.
Cafe Delisserie is just next door and great for breakfast and the location of the hotel is great to be able to hop in a taxi to eat out in the evenings
Lots of good restaurant choices along a West Beach which is nice for a stroll in the evenings.
Andrea was super helpful from booking right through to providing tips and recommendations while we were there.
100% recommend 😊

Andrea is a great host! Easy check in and we loved our stay. The apartment is in a great spot within the hotel, private and away from the noise of the pool but easily accessible through the back door so you have best of both worlds! The pool in the back is great and the rooms are both excellent sized. Will be staying here again at the next trip to Dubai!

primaryHost.about:
I'm Andrea, a Dubai resident for 17 years. As a wife, mother, and passionate runner, I thrive in the city's vibrant atmosphere. With my Ecuadorian/Italian heritage, I'm driven by the joy of connecting with diverse cultures, which led me to become an Airbnb host. I'm the owner of multiple units in  Dubai, I offer exceptional amenities to ensure a comfortable and unforgettable stay.

Feel free to reach out with any questions about my listings.

The Ultra Luxurious Master Bedroom, and yes that is indeed the Burj Khalifa you see from the window!
The view from the balcony, full Panoramic gorgeous view, you can see the Ras Al Khor Lake, the new Dubai Creek Development and of course the Burj Khalifa and the gorgeous Fountains!
The Burj Khalifa view from the Living room Balcony!
This is the view from the Balcony! The Living Room, and the Master Bedroom!

name: Luxurious Burj Khalifa & Fountain Designer 3 Bed

reviews.comments: This was a fabulous 4 day stay for our trip. The location was easy to access and find, it has a bridge link directly to Dubai mall and the metro station, which takes approximately 7 minutes. This apartment has a stunning view facing the water fountain and burj khalifa, and a spacious balcony that you could watch the water fountain easily without being in the crowd. Besides, the service we received was excellent, with prompt response and flexibility around our journey. Polite and well-rounded support throughout. I strongly recommend this apartment for a stay in Dubai. You would not regret it.

Superb location with breathtaking views of the Khalifa and Dubai downtown. The rooms are amazing just like the pictures. Shahid and folks were excellent hosts and helped us being a big group. Helped with our bags and was flexible with our arrival times.
Totally worth the money and great value!

Magnifique view and very warm welcome
Everything was perfect
Thanks

This is a fantastic apartment. There are great views of the Burj Khalifa and the fountains. The apartment has an airconditioned walkway connecting directly the Dubai mall, which is very convenient. Host was quick to respond and helpful.

There were some good points and some bad points about our stay.
Firstly, the good points:
1. Incredible views of the rear side of Burj Khalifa. Night time view was out of this world.
2. Responsive team and clear check in procedure
3. Great location, next to a supermarket and direct access to Dubai Mall.
Ok the bad points:
1. Unfortunately the unit is in need of deep cleaning and maintenance in our opinion. It has great potential but there were several issues we encountered, including but not limited to: Candy stuck to the mattress from a previous guest. Dirty floors in the living area. Random liquid stains on walls in living area. Flood damage in master bathroom. Mould in the bathrooms. Damaged walls in all rooms (white chips in the paintwork).
I'm sure had we reported these issues at check in, the team would have helped and Ana was especially helpful, but honestly we just wanted a few days away and I don't think it should be our responsibility to flag stuff like this.
Great views pics as described

As described, it is bang in front of the Burj Khalifa tower, world's tallest structure! And the views from this 54th floor apartment is stunning in the night. The best views are from the master bedroom which has wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling glass on one side, the glass frame is slanting outside, giving a great plunge view.
The apartment is as described but a bit aged. Since it is managed by a company, there is a team that looks after all the communication/needs which is very convenient.
All I have to say is extremely friendly and an awesome place and location! Would thoroughly recommend well done to the whole team, the messaging made it so easy 💪👏👏👏
Beautiful place with a great view. Amazing services from the host, worth every dime
Wonderful appartement with spectacular view. Won’t be my last time.

primaryHost.about:
At Dream Stays, we aspire to redefine your lodging. We hold ourselves to highest standard of service, not only meeting but surpassing the standards set by the hospitality industry. We thrive to be your number one choice for stay. We offer our guests the 24/7 conveniences of hotel services, along with the comfort of a home. We thrive to go above and beyond, to win your heart and mind, to ensure that you will come back, offering great value with no compromises, offering the highest level of service and accommodation luxury. 

We offer one of the very best of Dubai, not only the most exclusive neighborhood in Dubai, a gated community with your very own pristine private beach, but also one of the very best properties for accommodation. We offer fresh, modern, iconic, well-appointed and beautifully decorated spaces. Our team has put thought into every detail, to ensure that you are wowed all the way, that whether it be your vacation or a work visit, our space offers you a fantasy escape, and you are happy to return or refer your friends, family, colleagues, and loved ones to come stay with us. With a team keen on ensuring you make the best of your stay, we are there to guide you every step of the way, making sure you experience all you can during your stay in Dubai. With a diverse team with experience in North America, we are professionally run, incorporating professionalism with cultural diversity, knowledge, and practices that will enhance our guest comfort and experience.

reviews.comments: Shahid and his team were extremely helpful. Not only is the place beautiful with best views in the city, but the hosts themselves are responsive and hospitable.

Wow - the views from all 3 king-size bedrooms and the two large balconies were absolutely spectacular.
An amazingly located condo only a few minutes walk to the Burj khalifa, Fountains and Dubai Mall.
We visited with two other couples and each and every one of us had a fantastic and extremely comfortable stay, enjoying the facilities provided within the condo as well as the communal leisure facilities.
Shahid and the team (Ana and Gomba) were excellent in supporting our stay and responding to any questions that we had.
Overall, a 5 star home and we will definitely look to return when we next visit Dubai.
Thank you Shahid.
Very nice view and plenty of space. Overall, a pleasant stay.

All the rental team replied quickly and were knowledgeable. They advised with visa application instructions and local area information. Early morning and late evening queries were answered promptly.
The apartment was bang on. Top place and mint views.
If downtown Dubai is your destination you won’t do wrong staying here.
Aircon was quality, cold and clean smelling. Beds proper comfy and apartment full of added extras like washing tablets for dishwasher and washing machine.
Would I book with these again.
Absolutely.
Would I stay in this apartment again
Absolutely.
Thanks Shahid, Ana and Willis. Keep up the good work.
Until the next time.

visited with kids and it was just the right place.
good views of the Burj and fountain
Location is a dream, apartment was very clean and spacious. The team is very organized and easy to communicate with. My friends and I had an excellent stay. Thank you.
Best place to stay .. very closed to mall and beautiful view ❤️

Stayed for a whole month. Surely one of the best apartments in Dubai. Views from every room stunning, great gym and direct connection to the mall by AC walkway. 2 Balconies. Clean, working AC, lots of storage and great wifi and fantastic host. What more could you ask for.

This apartment is a gorgeous apartment on 12th floor beauty, situated in the residences at BlueWaters Island, right across Madam Tussauds. The apartment is fully furnished, has great bathrooms and a gorgeous view of water on all 3 sides. We stayed here for a week, and extended for a day, thank the host for being accommodating with check in and check out process. Bonus is a daily cleaning offered by them and they make sure our apartment was brand new everyday. We absolutely loved staying here.
Tips: Do checkout the FranxPrix store downstairs they will deliver you to your door. Try out Lebanese restaurant TETE downstairs and ask them for the 15% residence discount. About COVID test, pay not more than 150AED for at home testing, and for roundtrip dropoff max 350AED. Or better book an Uber, it would be 90-100AED. To book any rides, tours or activities check the deal on Klook for most competitive pricing.

I very often rent premium-class housing, in particular, from Arnbn, but this is the second time when I meet such a wonderful attitude and professionalism. Mara can hear the client and quickly make his stay magical

Great view. Poorly equipped kitchen: 3 forks, 3 plates, one machete sized knife, very small cutting board. Fridge and freezer needed to be defrosted. Much of the furniture was very worn and stained. I asked the host to deliver additional forks and plates, as we couldn’t set a full table for 4. The host responded by offering us to move out if we were unhappy. It is very surprising to us that the listing has so many great reviews.
reviews.response: Thank you for your valued feedback. It is very unfortunate that you experienced certain issues during your stay. We take great pride to ensure that all our guests have a fantastic time whilst staying with us in Dubai. The flat is equipped with sufficient utensils/cutlery to cater as a one bedroom apartment with four guests ( 2 Adults & 2 Children as per our listing ). We have different size knives suitable for use in a domestic kitchen. As such, machete size knives is not something we would keep for our guests. Both the fridge and freezer are checked and cleaned after each guest vacating. These were both functioning normally. The furniture provided is both comfortable and clean. It became apparent that as our guest, you were not enjoying your stay. As such, an offer to cancel the booking was mentioned. Although this would be at a financial loss to us, it is important that the guest is happy and satisfied. Finally, the reason the listing has great reviews is because the vast majority of our guests - 95+ - greatly appreciate the accommodation that we offer - including cleanliness and the facilities. We hope that you enjoyed your time in Dubai !

reviews.response:
Dear Jess, thank you so much for your kind words and for your 5 star review. I truly appreciate! Hope I can host you again.
Only comment what I have the toiletries what we use are ECO - organic - fragrance free shower gels and shampoos, as a host I truly believe in this kind of products and I think they are better than all the chemicals what we use every day. I can assure you it wasn’t cheap but next time I’m happy to provide Rituals as the hotel side does. Wish you all the best!

Pros:

Cons:
* The unit didn't have hot water (for shower, washing, etc.) for the whole time we were there. Even worse, see next:
* The host has outsourced the rental management to a company. There is absolute communication chaos with delays and you being bounced from one person to another if you need something (hot water). waste of time.

reviews.comments: Perfect apartment for holidays, nice location, parking, good furniture, all the beds are comfortable. Can recommend this apartment to families.
Fantastic location and a great host.

Qasim's apartment on Bluewaters Island is absolutely exceptional. It was perfect for our family. Our two teenagers loved having their own room with bathroom and TV. It is very spacious and each of the three rooms has its own bathroom plus there is a guest toilet in the entrance area. Each room can be individually air conditioned which is another plus. We felt completely comfortable and enjoyed the much too short 10 days to the fullest. But not only the apartment is a highlight, the view of the skyline of JBR and the Address Beach Resort is hard to top, just wow.
Since the Ain Dubai was not yet in operation during our stay, it was relatively quiet on the island, unfortunately, most stores were still closed but perhaps that was also quite good.
Right next door in building 7 is the supermarket Franprix, where there is everything to buy for everyday use. In building 9 is "Scarlet" a German bakery, they bake fantastic bread and patisserie.
There are 5 pools in the complex, we used the one in building 2 as it is the largest. With the access cards you can get in everywhere. In building 7 there is also a small fitness center and again in building 2 right next to the pool there is a two-story fitness center, which can also be used.
The island is like a small city within the city, just phenomenal. You can get by foot to the JBR in 20 minutes via the purpose built walk, which is another advantage.
If you need a PCR test for the trip home or a visit to Abu Dhabi, I can recommend the app Rizek. There you can book a PCR test for about AED 165 per person. You choose a time slot and a doctor comes to your home, does the test and 12 hours later you get the result via mail - great service! This was already our 3rd stay in Dubai but by far the best! And one thing is for sure we will be back!!!

reviews.comments: Peter is very helpful. The villa is great location and very spacious. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you Peter

I am not normally person who leaves feedback, but I wish I have had somebody left detailed review before I rented the property. At least I would know what I am getting into for the price. Beware, they will deny bad reviews if you ask them.
The houses is roach infested, i had to clean up roaches everywhere even after they did pest control
The pool cleaning system was not working, and it got dirty, there were trash left by the previous renters. they have sent pool cleaners but it didn’t work, i think there is a fundamental problem with the filter
There were little ants in the house especially on the dining room furniture and they were biting type
The dishwasher and washing machine had musty smell and the cheap detergent they provided made it smell even worse . I bought my own detergent. there is no dryer and you really need one
Lastly, we wanted to check out late, they allowed us to stay until 12 pm, but their cleaning crew arrived at 11 am
reviews.response:
Hi Hatice, thanks for leaving a review.
First, we are not denying any bad reviews here. As you can see others has a good memories too.
It's summer time in Dubai, if you searched online it's the time that roaches and some insects are coming up in this season. In addition, there's a mini garden in the villa so ants are also expected.
We take hosting very seriously that's why when you told me you saw 4 cockroaches I sent the housekeeping team right away to clean. We did pest control every 2 weeks, of course even if we do it there's still chances that something will pop up.
For the other stuff, you can buy online. They will deliver immediately. This is just a complimentary for our guest. Take noted we are not a hotel. We are a private home in a residential area.
For the dryer, it's not stated in our listing. We only provide washing machine.
Yes, the cleaning team arrived at 11am but you still left the villa at 12pm. Usually if our housekeeping team arrived, we are not allowing the guest to stay for security reasons. The guest must leave at 11AM ( standard check-out time ).
Thanks and I hope we have a chance to host you again and show our usual 5-star service in the future!

reviews.comments: Thanks
reviews.response: Thank you so much Minem, for taking the time to leave us positive feedback. We look forward to hosting again in the future. Good luck and stay safe.

reviews.comments:
the apartment was very clean as it was new and maybe i’m the first one to rent it. i feel like it was up on the site while it was in the final touches and somethings they couldn’t finish yet or have the time to look after but nothing to worry it’s simple things nothing major like there was no trash pins and there’s some nails and bulbs on the table forgot by someone. they tried to help by bringing the trash pins but after many times of communication and only before 2 days of the end of our stay.
there’s 2 major things we felt wrong and unpleasant here and you should know before renting the apartment:
1- the location in it self was great! i mean the views are second to non. it’s really one of a kind as it sits on the entrance to bluewaters nothing can block your stunning view angles which you can see the palm, bluewaters and a little from the beach of the JBR. also the marina. but on the downside this building has one of the worst exits i have ever seen. it’s not a small thing you can get over it’s a dealbreaker acutely as it’s exit to the parking lot mandatory then to Al Seba St. and it’s the only way if you want to go by car or taxi. In rush hours I was stuck in traffic for more then 2 hours without moving an inch which made me leave my car there and go by foot just to get out of the situation. we had to book the taxi and went out side the building entrance in the middle of the highway every time we wanted to go out just so we can go through bluewaters and make the U-turn from there. also you live on the other-side of marina so if this was in middle of it or at the beginning it well not be a problem as there’s bridges that connects both sides together but here you can only cross by walking a total distance of 2 km or more and also by walking partially on the highway. no near supermarket or anything by walking. totally not worth the hassle. it’s that bad trust me everyone here knows the struggle and try to run away from it. if you can live with that then this place is for you.
2- this building is still under construction. the pool was closed for all of our stay. there’s also people working on there apartment so it might get loud and noisy as there’s no clear working hours mentioned but it’s ok. also we found a very unpleasant foul odour coming from one of the bathrooms! like sewage. I hope that gets fixed soon.
just to note the first two bedrooms have one air condition unit control so if they sleep while ac is off you kind have too.
this explains my experience here and the ratings i gave this facility. we are a family of 4 adults and it’s my 5th time visiting dubai.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback.  We will take in your comments and forward them to the management. We look forward to hosting again in the future. Good luck and stay safe.

reviews.comments:
My family and I had a reunion here for my mom’s birthday. The place is part of a resort-like hotel/apartment complex. So you feel like you are in a 5 bedroom condo in a 5-star ocean-front resort :)
The place was spacious with beautiful ocean views with access to a private beach club (pools, drinks food shower and beach access, ...) which was luxurious.
My family and I had lots of fun, made a lot of memories and had tons of space for all of us to have privacy while being together.
